wiki.summary: "Cruel Summer" is about a tumultuous relationship between two people, set against a summer backdrop. The lyrics tell the story of someone who is desperately in love, who has to sneak away from their protective family to be with their love, and how that love is both exhilarating and painful. Despite the feeling of uncertainty and potential hurt, the singer is hopeful that their love will conquer even the most difficult odds and that their relationship will survive. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "Cruel Summer" is about a tumultuous relationship between two people, set against a summer backdrop. The lyrics tell the story of someone who is desperately in love, who has to sneak away from their protective family to be with their love, and how that love is both exhilarating and painful. Despite the feeling of uncertainty and potential hurt, the singer is hopeful that their love will conquer even the most difficult odds and that their relationship will survive. The chorus, "It's a cruel summer / But I'll tell 'em it's cool", serves as a metaphor for the relationships complexity, as the singer seeks comfort in the idea that, despite everything, their love is worth it. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
